column1: 1558|three-fifty-eight|A hum of tolling bells makes itself heard
column2: but not sharply. At three-fifty-eight a waiting interval. Presently a long procession of gentlemen in evening dress comes in sight and approaches until it is near to the square
column3: then falls back against the wall of soldiers at the sidewalk
column4: and the white shirt-fronts show like snowflakes and are very conspicuous where so much warm color is all about.
